name: Screwdriver
description: A screwdriver is a hand tool used to insert and remove screws. It typically consists of a metal rod with a pointed end (the blade) and a handle. The blade is designed to fit into the screw head, and the handle allows the user to turn the screwdriver to drive the screw into or out of the workpiece. Different types of screwdrivers exist to match the various shapes of screw heads, including flathead, Phillips, and Torx.
